Subfields.Name: Facial Recognition
Subfields.Description: A biometric software application capable of uniquely identifying or verifying a person
Subfields.Application: Security checkpoints and unlocking mobile devices (FaceID)

Subfields.Name: Image Classification
Subfields.Description: The process of assigning a specific label or category to an entire image
Subfields.Application: Automatic photo tagging in Google Photos

Subfields.Name: Object Detection
Subfields.Description: Identifying and locating objects within an image by drawing bounding boxes

Subfields.Name: Semantic Segmentation
Subfields.Description: Linking each pixel in an image to a class label for precise understanding
Subfields.Application: Medical imaging analysis to detect tumors

Subfields.Name: Deep Learning
Subfields.Description: A subset of machine learning based on artificial neural networks with multiple layers
Subfields.Application: Facial recognition systems used in security

Subfields.Name: Reinforcement Learning
Subfields.Description: A method where an agent learns to make decisions by performing actions and receiving rewards
Subfields.Application: AI systems playing complex games like AlphaGo

Subfields.Name: Supervised Learning
Subfields.Description: Training a model on a labeled dataset where the correct output is known

Subfields.Name: Unsupervised Learning
Subfields.Description: Using machine learning algorithms to analyze and cluster unlabeled datasets

Subfields.Name: Machine Translation
Subfields.Description: Automated translation of text or speech from one natural language to another
Subfields.Application: Real-time translation tools like Google Translate

Subfields.Name: Sentiment Analysis
Subfields.Description: The process of determining the emotional tone behind a text

Subfields.Name: Speech Recognition
Subfields.Description: The ability of a machine to identify and process human speech into a written format

Subfields.Name: Text Summarization
Subfields.Description: The process of shortening a set of data computationally

Subfields.Name: Human-Robot Interaction
Subfields.Description: The study of interactions and communication between humans and robots

Subfields.Name: Medical Robotics
Subfields.Description: Robots utilized in the medical sciences, including surgery

Subfields.Name: Robot Motion Planning
Subfields.Description: Determining a path for a robot to move without colliding

Subfields.Name: Swarm Robotics
Subfields.Description: Coordination of large numbers of mostly simple physical robots
Subfields.Application: Search and rescue missions using drone swarms
